1.descricao: Choose one — Target player gains X life; or prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

2.descricao:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, Battering Ram gains banding until end of combat. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's blocking.)

Whenever Battering Ram becomes blocked by a Wall, destroy that Wall at end of combat.

regras.texto: If a creature with banding attacks, it can team up with any number of other attacking creatures with banding (and up to one nonbanding creature) and attack as a unit called a "band." The band can be blocked by any creature that could block a single creature in the band. Blocking any creature in a band blocks the entire band. If a creature with banding is blocked, the attacking player chooses how the blockers' damage is assigned.
A maximum of one nonbanding creature can join an attacking band no matter how many creatures with banding are in it.
Creatures in the same band must all attack the same player or planeswalker.
If a creature in combat has banding, its controller assigns damage for creatures blocking or blocked by it. That player can ignore the damage assignment order when making this assignment.

3.descricao: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar.)

4.descricao: Cruza pantanos. (Esta criatura es imbloqueable mientras el jugador defensor controle un pantano.)

5.descricao: {1}: La próxima vez que una fuente negra de tu elección fuera a hacerte daño este turno, prevén ese daño.

regras.texto: A source of damage is a permanent, a spell on the stack (including one that creates a permanent), or any object referred to by an object on the stack. A source doesn't need to be capable of dealing damage to be a legal choice.
Can be used even when there is no damage to prevent. It prevents the next damage (if any) from the source this turn.

6.descricao: {1}: La próxima vez que una fuente roja de tu elección fuera a hacerte daño este turno, prevén ese daño.

regras.texto: A source of damage is a permanent, a spell on the stack (including one that creates a permanent), or any object referred to by an object on the stack. A source doesn't need to be capable of dealing damage to be a legal choice.
Can be used even when there is no damage to prevent. It prevents the next damage (if any) from the source this turn.

7.descricao:
Clockwork Beast enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it.

At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.

{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

regras.texto: Loses a counter even if it is affected by a Fog-like effect which prevents it from dealing damage.
Can attack or block even if it has no counters.
This is a change from the most recent wording. Now, if some other spell or ability causes +1/+0 counters to be put on Clockwork Beast, it can wind up with more than seven such counters on it.

If Clockwork Beast has seven or fewer +1/+0 counters on it when its last ability resolves, it can wind up a maximum of seven such counters on it. If it has seven or more +1/+0 counters on it, the ability will have no effect.
Clockwork Beast's last ability resolves, you can choose to put fewer than X +1/+0 counters on it.

8.descricao:
Enchant land

At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, Cursed Land deals 1 damage to that player.

10.descricao: Destruye el artefacto objetivo con coste de maná convertido igual a X. No puede ser regenerado. Detonar hace X puntos de daño al controlador de ese artefacto.

regras.texto: If the artifact becomes an illegal target before resolution, then no damage is done.

11.descricao: Desintegrar hace X puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo. Esa criatura no puede ser regenerada este turno. Si la criatura fuera a ir a un cementerio este turno, en vez de eso, remuévela del juego.

regras.texto: The "can't regenerate" is an effect of Disintegrate and not an effect of the damage. It works even if the damage is prevented or redirected. If redirected, the damage does not take this effect with it.
Disintegrated creatures do not go to the graveyard at all before being exiled. They do not trigger abilities which trigger due to a creature going to the graveyard.

13.descricao: Los Jinetes élficos no pueden ser bloqueados excepto por Muros y/o criaturas con la habilidad de volar.

regras.texto: Creatures with the Reach ability (such as Giant Spider) don't actually have Flying, so they can't block this.

15.descricao: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."

16.descricao:
Enchant enchantment

At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, Feedback deals 1 damage to that player.

17.descricao:
La Bola de fuego hace X puntos de daño dividido en partes iguales, redondeado hacia abajo, entre cualquier número de criaturas y/o jugadores objetivo.

Como coste adicional para jugar la Bola de fuego, paga {1} por cada objetivo después del primero.

regras.texto: The additional cost is paid when you pay the rest of Fireball's costs, even though that text appears second on the card (to make the card easier to read). The additional cost doesn't count toward Fireball's converted mana cost.

If, for example, X is 5 and you choose three target creatures, Fireball has a total cost of {7}{R} (even though its mana cost is just {5}{R}). If those creatures are all still legal targets as Fireball resolves, it deals 1 damage to each of them.
You may cast Fireball with zero targets, regardless of the value chosen for X. If you do so, it will not be a targeted spell, and no damage will actually be dealt when it resolves.
Fireball's damage is divided as Fireball resolves, not as it's cast, because there are no choices involved. The division involves only targets that are still legal at that time.
You can target more than X creatures. However, if the number of legal targets at the time Fireball resolves is greater than X, none of them will be dealt any damage.

23.descricao: Elige uno: El jugador objetivo gana 3 vidas; o prevén los siguientes 3 puntos de daño que se le fuera a hacer a la criatura o jugador objetivo este turno.

25.descricao: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.

32.descricao: Flying; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

regras.texto: If a creature with banding attacks, it can team up with any number of other attacking creatures with banding (and up to one nonbanding creature) and attack as a unit called a "band." The band can be blocked by any creature that could block a single creature in the band. Blocking any creature in a band blocks the entire band. If a creature with banding is blocked, the attacking player chooses how the blockers' damage is assigned.
A maximum of one nonbanding creature can join an attacking band no matter how many creatures with banding are in it.
Creatures in the same band must all attack the same player or planeswalker.
If a creature in combat has banding, its controller assigns damage for creatures blocking or blocked by it. That player can ignore the damage assignment order when making this assignment.

37.descricao: Whenever Murk Dwellers attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.

regras.texto: An ability that triggers when something "attacks and isn't blocked" triggers in the declare blockers step after blockers are declared if (1) that creature is attacking and (2) no creatures are declared to block it. It will trigger even if that creature was put onto the battlefield attacking rather than having been declared as an attacker in the declare attackers step.

38.descricao: {T}: La Artillería orca hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo y 3 puntos de daño a ti.

regras.texto: You do not take the 3 points of damage if the ability is countered because the target is illegal.

45.descricao: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands with mana abilities he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

regras.texto: Does not increase the mana cost of the spell. It just requires a separate expenditure in order for it to succeed.

When this spell resolves, you either pay X mana or let your lands become tapped. The lands that become tapped are not "tapped for mana". If you choose to pay, you may pay the X mana using whatever mana abilities you want to use.

Only lands that actually have mana abilities will get tappped. This includes basic lands and lands with mana abilities printed on them, as well as lands which have been granted a mana ability by some effect.

46.descricao: La Pirotecnia hace 4 puntos de daño divididos de la manera que elijas entre cualquier número de criaturas y/o jugadores objetivo.

regras.texto: You can assign damage to multiple targets and are not forced to assign the same amount of damage to each target.
You can't do fractional points of damage.
The number of targets must be at least 1 and at most 4. You divide the damage as you cast Pyrokinesis, not as it resolves. Each target must be assigned at least 1 damage.

47.descricao: Regresa la carta objetivo de criatura de tu cementerio a tu mano.

regras.texto: You must show the card you bring out of the graveyard to your opponent.
The creature being brought back is chosen on announcement and not on resolution of the spell because it is targeted.
A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

48.descricao: La próxima vez que una fuente de tu elección fuera a hacerte daño este turno, prevén ese daño. Gana esa cantidad de vida.

regras.texto: It only affects damage dealt by the source one time. If the source damages you a second time this turn, the damage will not be reversed.

49.descricao: {3}, {T}: El Bastón de destrucción hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.

51.descricao: {T}: Target creature other than Sorceress Queen becomes 0/2 until end of turn.

55.descricao: Destruye la criatura objetivo que no sea negra o artefacto. No puede ser regenerado.

56.descricao: Gira o endereza el artefacto, criatura o tierra objetivo.

regras.texto: This is not a toggle effect. If you use Twiddle to tap a card and before it takes effect your opponent taps it, Twiddle will not automatically untap the card.
The decision whether or not to tap or untap is made on resolution. This is not a modal spell.

57.descricao: Regresa la criatura objetivo a la mano de su propietario.

58.descricao: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

regras.texto: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
Can fetch a snow land.

59.descricao:
Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)

{B}: Los Murciélagos vampiro obtienen +1/+0 hasta el final del turno. No juegues esta habilidad más de dos veces cada turno.

60.descricao:
Defensor. (Esta criatura no puede atacar.)

{B}: Regenera el Muro de huesos. (La próxima vez que esta criatura fuera a ser destruida este turno, no lo es. En vez de eso, gírala, remueve todo el daño de ella y remuévela del combate.)

62.descricao:
Enchant artifact

At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to that player.

63.descricao:
Encantar criatura.

La criatura encantada obtiene -2/-1.

64.descricao:
Protección contra negro.

Al final del turno, si los Hostigadores derviches hicieron daño a un oponente este turno, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre ellos.

regras.texto: If it damages the opponent multiple times in a turn, it gets only one +1/+1 counter at end of turn.

65.descricao: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.

regras.texto: Winter Blast can target tapped creatures. If they have flying, the second part of the effect will still affect them.
Checks if the creatures are Flying on resolution and not on announcement. It's not a targeting restriction.
